title: The Cowboy's Baby Surprise
description: More than a year had passed since FBI agent Carley Mills's partner disappeared without a trace. Then, just when she'd almost given up hope, she found him, working as a cowboy on a Texas ranch. But, incredibly, he had no memory of his true identity -- or the shattering passion they had once shared....She ached to take Witt Davidson in her embrace and tell him who he really was, what he had always meant to her. But what if he could never remember the sizzling desire that had constantly flashed between them? And what would he do when he learned of the beautiful child their love had created...?
author: Linda Conrad
